title: Carlos Humberto Aceves
text: Carlos Humberto Aceves del Olmo (born 5 November 1940) is a <a href="Mexican%20people">Mexican</a> <a href="trade%20union">union</a> leader and politician affiliated with the <a href="Institutional%20Revolutionary%20Party">PRI</a>. He currently serves as Secretary General to CTM (Confederation of Mexican Workers) Union, representing the largest number of Union Workers in Mexico <a href="Labor%20Movement%20Mexico">Labor Movement Mexico</a>. He is also the President to de Congreso del Trabajo, organization that represents over 40 Union Organizations. He has been a Federal Congressman in 3 terms as well as a <a href="Senate%20of%20Mexico">Senator</a> during the <a href="LX%20Legislature%20of%20the%20Mexican%20Congress">LX</a> and <a href="LXI%20Legislature%20of%20the%20Mexican%20Congress">LXI</a> Legislatures.
